name: Two Builders
description:
This is a very simple but full of rhythm games.

HOW TO PLAY

The two builders need to exchange each other's position to catch the sticks falling from their heads.
If the two builders match the colors of the sticks, they will catch the stick and build a high building.
If the colors are not the same, you will die.

This is my 9th game in three years. I hope you will like it.

Sleeeeepfly Studios
Yufeng Long
A Chinese indie game developer

Twitter:@sleeeeepfly
